ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(If( !ISBLANK(Project_Name__c), AND( ISCHANGED( RW_Project__c ), OR( PRIORVALUE(Project_Name__c) <> "Runwal Gardens", PRIORVALUE(Project_Name__c) <> "Runwal MyCity" ), Project_Name__c <> "Runwal Garden City", $Profile.Name = "Pre Sales Executive") ,False) ,$Label.Disable_all_validations_from_lead == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/)
/*If(!ISBLANK(Project_Name__c),AND( ISCHANGED( RW_Project__c ), $Profile.Name = "Pre Sales Executive") ,False)*/
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Presales User cannot modify the Project
